item.description:
Join us for the 9th Annual Jeffrey Coombs Memorial Road Race and Walk in Abington.

Quoted from the registration form:
This race is held in memory of Jeff Coombs, Flight 11- 9/11/01.
Make this your 9/11 Day of Service Project! Federal legislation has designation 9/11 as a National Day of Service and Remembrance. Walk, run or contribute in memory of Jeff or someone you love.

I have posted this event time for 8am and I will meet people at the event then before the walk and run start.

I have also listed the event fee at the max amount of $20. Please see below:

Time:
Race day registration: 7:30-8:30am
Run begins: 9:00am
Walk begins: 9:05am

Place:
Woodsdale School
128 Chestnut St
Abington, MA 02351

Entry Fee:
Preregistration
Adults: $17
Students 13-18: $12
12 and under: $5
* Please note: All Pre-registrations must be received by August 31st.
**T-SHIRTS GUARANTEED TO ALL REGISTRANTS WITH ENTRIES POST-MARKED BY AUG. 31ST

AFTER AUGUST 31st:
Adults: $20
Students 13-18: $15
12 and under: $8


REGISTRATION FORM AVAILABLE AT THIS LINK:
http://www.jeffcoombs...

Make checks payable to:
Jeff Coombs Memorial Road Race

Mail entry form to:
Jeff Coombs Memorial Road Race
PO Box 463
Abington, MA 02351

Course: Begins and ends at the Woodsdale School
Right onto Chestnut St
Right onto Randolph St/RT 139
Right onto Lincoln St
Right onto Hancock St
Right onto Chestnut St to finish

Amenities: DJ, free food, raffles, awards, free kids' activities, Pre-registered b y Aug 31st Get a Free T-Shirt!

Even if you are still in training, this will be a nice way to judge your own progress. And there is nothing wrong with walking part of it. Runners are only against themselves and go at their own pace!

Directions on registration form
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the parking lot.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: 9th Annual Jeffrey Coombs Memorial Road Race and Walk, Abington
